resources.string: Main Activity - home of my music player showing currently playing or recently played song. After clicking on the picture of the album it will show details through http://musicbrainz.org - free database that provides API for looking up data. In the bottom there will be media player implemented through MediaPlayer class.
Search Activity - This screen will be used for searching for music either stored in the device or in external database (connected through API).
Playlists Activity - this screen will allow user to create, name and store his playlists. This screen will also offer recently played tracks.
Mood Activity - this screen will offer selection of curated playlists containing music of some specific mood.
Radio Activity - this screen will offer user to follow and listen to radio stations through Tune-In API.
James Blake - The Colour in Anything
